findings.title: Incorrect sequence of arguments in updateUserAverageSlashingFees()
findings.description: The incorrect sequence of arguments in updateUserAverageSlashingFees() causes averageStakedTime to increase for users and slashDays to decrease when claiming Astra using claimAstra().

findings.title: Inaccurate reward calculation formula
findings.description: The reward calculation formula is incorrect due to decimals being staked in itoken-staking contract.

findings.title: IToken staking gives the same reward for Different iTokens.
findings.description: The itoken-staking contract rewards the same amount for different iTokens despite requiring different amounts of stablecoins to mint them. This means that iTokens from costly indexes receive the same rewards as those from cheap indexes, and vice versa.
